item.description:
Hey Incubators!!

My sincerest apologies for the late notices on these lately but I've been away and summertime has been tough for our assistant organizers so this week I am pleased to let you know that our lovely Nikki will be running the show.

Like always bring your best smile, some outragous laughter, and have your wits about you and have your friends wits about you too by inviting them along.

Oh and this week feel free to bring your magic wands.

Same place, same time, same fun!

Enjoy!

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: Ahh a magic spell has cast me away for the week but I will be back soon...
item.name: Harry Improv and the Half-Cambridge Prince
